options_3.label: Only pin to top on mobile

sync_margins_with_theme.label: Align module margins with the theme

desktop_enable_slider.label: Scroll left and right to view on desktop

mobile_limit.label: The maximum number of categories displayed on the mobile terminal

mobile_enable_slider.label: Turn on left-right scroll to View all

show_type.label: Show content
show_type.info: You need to add two or more markets for the 'country/region selector' to work. To add markets, go to market settings. You also need to add two or more languages in market-language management for the selector to function. To add languages, visit language settings, and after adding, go to market-language management to set up multilingual support for the current market [overview](https://help.shopline.com/hc/en-001/articles/27936284578585-Markets-Management-Overview)

show_locale_picker.label: Display Language selector
show_locale_picker.info: You need to go to 'Market' > 'Language management' and add at least two languages for the selector to take effect. To add a language, go to ['Language settings'](/admin/settings/lang), and after adding is complete, go to ['Market'](/admin/settings/markets) > 'Language management' and add the language of the current market.

show_country_picker.label: Display country/region selection
show_country_picker.info: Add at least two markets for this to take effect. To add a country/region, go to [Market settings](/admin/settings/markets)

options_0.label: Logo in the center, menu below

options_1.label: Logo to the left, menu to the left

options_3.label: Logo in the center, menu to the left

group_header_0.label: Please go to "Blog" and manage the comment handling settings in the blog collection to allow comments
Go to 'Collection > Collection info' to modify content and layout

banner_height.label: Banner height
banner_height.info: To achieve optimal results, please use an image with 16:9 aspect ratio

show_text_below.label: Display contents below image on mobile device

image_quality.label: Image compression ratio
image_quality.info: Configure the compression ratio for main and thumbnail images. We recommend selecting a compression ratio of 80% or lower to ensure optimal store performance and user experience.

link_text.label: Link text
link_text.info: Display this text on the desktop only

inventory_threshold.label: Low inventory threshold
inventory_threshold.info: Selecting of 0 means to display "In stock" all the time

hover_show_next_image.label: Display next product image on hover

color_shadow.label: Shadow
color_shadow.info: Shade color for buttons/product cards/category cards/blog cards

group_header_1.label: Grid
group_header_1.info: Affects multi-columns or rows grid layout

group_header_1.label: Product card discount tag
group_header_1.info: This only affects the promotion tag. You can set the tag display on the product details page in Product details > Price.

group_header_0.label: Account
group_header_0.info: Guide customers to your social media account

favicon_image.label: Site icon
favicon_image.info: Displayed in browser tab, size: 32 x 32px
